I had two wisdom teeth removed dignonally opposite at the same time. One required surgery as it was in the formation of a hook, settled in a nerve and the other one was to be extracted. Both were stage 4 decayed.
1. On my first visit I was greeted with chilled Apple Fizz and a typed prescription with clearly mentioning my issues on one side and medicines on another. He did not poke the decayed teeth instead asked us to get a second x-ray and email the same instead of running around. 
2. We discussed everything else via phone and chat. He was prompt in replying and gave detail replies. 
3. On the D-day it went so smoothly, he kept on chatting and making sure I was not in pain. Both him and his staff member - Sandhya were highly professional. I had very less swelling than I had expected and was able to chew solid food within few hours. He went ahead and enquired about my health in the evening.
4. Today is my 3rd day after surgery, both teeth are healed, though I still have stitches on. I don't really remember getting it done. 
Overall one of the best experiences, along with that very reasonable fees and various modes of payment. Instead of feeling embarrassed of the decayed teeth, I actually felt confident. Thank you so much Dr. Khatri for the whole experience, truly appreciated.
